pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Probability Lower Bounds for the Total Variance Distance // An implementation of high-probability lower bounds for the total variance distance as introduced in Michel Naef Meinshausen (2020) arXiv:2005.06006. An estimated lower-bound (with high-probability) on the total variation distance between two probability distributions from which samples are observed can be obtained with the function HPLB.
